Author: Deleted User
Content: Hey, is there a version compatible with Cairo 1? ğŸ™‚

Author: exfalsoquodlibet
Content: There isn't. There are plans for one, but it's not in development yet. At the very least, it would require us to to completely rewrite the `Horus-compile` part from scratch, so it's a major undertaking we haven't been able to allocate resources to just yet. Unfortunately, there is also no specific timeline. That said, we understand that the community will shift towards Cairo 1. and Horus will need to shift with it, so it's definitely on our radars.
